extraVolumes.description: Extra volumes and mounts only for bucketweb
extraVolumes.title: extraVolumes

persistence.description: Storage not required for bucketweb, leave empty
persistence.title: persistence

replicaCount.description: Number of replicas. HPA can override effective replica count when enabled.
replicaCount.title: replicaCount

resources.description: Resource requests and limits for the bucketweb container
resources.title: resources

accessModes.description: Access modes when PVC is created
accessModes.title: accessModes

enabled.description: Enable a PVC for compactor work dir
enabled.title: enabled

storageClass.description: Storage class name, empty uses cluster default
storageClass.title: storageClass

global.description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Global settings applied as sensible defaults to all components
Each component can override with its own section if needed
--------------------------------------------------------------------

clusterDomain.description: Cluster domain, usually cluster.local, used in DNS names
clusterDomain.title: clusterDomain

commonLabels.description: Extra labels applied to all Kubernetes resources
commonLabels.title: commonLabels

containerSecurityContext.description: Container security context applied to all components unless overridden
containerSecurityContext.title: containerSecurityContext

extraEnv.description: Environment variables applied to main containers globally
extraEnv.title: extraEnv

extraInitContainers.description: Optional init containers and sidecars applied globally
extraInitContainers.title: extraInitContainers

extraVolumeMounts.description: Extra volume mounts applied to main containers by default
extraVolumeMounts.title: extraVolumeMounts

extraVolumes.description: Extra volumes available to all pods by default
extraVolumes.title: extraVolumes

pullPolicy.description: Image pull policy: Always IfNotPresent Never
pullPolicy.title: pullPolicy

repository.description: Docker repository for all Thanos containers by default
repository.title: repository

imagePullSecrets.description: Optional list of image pull secrets to use across all components
imagePullSecrets.title: imagePullSecrets

nodeSelector.description: Node scheduling defaults for all components
nodeSelector.title: nodeSelector

objstore.description:
------------------------------------------------------------------
Object store configuration shared by components that need it
Either create a Secret or provide inline config here
------------------------------------------------------------------

config.default:
type: GCS
config:
  bucket: change-me
  endpoint: storage.googleapis.com
  region: eu-west-1
  insecure: false
  
# Example for S3
# type: S3
# config:
#   bucket: my-s3-bucket
#   endpoint: s3.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com
#   region: eu-west-1
#   access_key: myaccess
#   secret_key: mysecret
config.description:
Inline object store configuration used when createSecret is false
Refer to Thanos docs for exact schema
config.title: config

createSecret.description: Create a Secret named secretName with key secretKey containing config below
createSecret.title: createSecret

secretKey.description: Key inside the Secret that stores the object store yaml
secretKey.title: secretKey

secretName.description: Name of the Kubernetes Secret that carries the object store config
secretName.title: secretName

objstore.title: objstore

podAnnotations.description: Extra annotations applied to all pods
podAnnotations.title: podAnnotations

podSecurityContext.description: Pod security context applied to all components unless overridden
podSecurityContext.title: podSecurityContext

create.description: Create RBAC resources globally where needed
create.title: create

resources.description: Default resource requests and limits for all components
resources.title: resources

create.description: Create a ServiceAccount per component by default
create.title: create

name.description: Optional name override for ServiceAccounts, empty means autogenerate
name.title: name

serviceMonitor.description:
------------------------------------------------------------------
ServiceMonitor defaults for Prometheus Operator scraping
Components can override under their own .serviceMonitor blocks
------------------------------------------------------------------
serviceMonitor.title: serviceMonitor

global.title: global

replicaLabels.description: Label names used to mark replica identity for deduplication
replicaLabels.title: replicaLabels

stores.description:
List of store gRPC endpoints the query component should connect to
Example:
stores:
  - dnssrv+_grpc._tcp.thanos-storegateway.monitoring.svc.cluster.local
stores.title: stores

cacheConfig.description: Optional caching config file content as string or reference via volume
cacheConfig.title: cacheConfig

autogen.description:
if enabled true, autogenerate a single ring named default with endpoints
receive-0.receive:10901 ... receive-(replicaCount-1).receive:10901
autogen.title: autogen

static.description:
optional static configuration to fully control rings
when non empty, it overrides autogen
static.title: static

tenancyHeader.description: Optional multi tenancy header name to segregate tenants
tenancyHeader.title: tenancyHeader

tsdb.description: TSDB settings for local storage of samples before shipping to object store

retention.description: TSDB retention period for local WAL
retention.title: retention

walCompression.description: Enable WAL compression to reduce IO and disk
walCompression.title: walCompression

tsdb.title: tsdb

alertQueryUrl.description: URL used in rule alerts to link back to a UI
alertQueryUrl.title: alertQueryUrl

alertmanagers.description: Alertmanager routing configuration in Thanos format
alertmanagers.title: alertmanagers

urls.description: List of base URLs for query component to evaluate rules against
urls.title: urls

rules.description: Inline rule files. Use external ConfigMap volumes for large rule sets.

example-alerts.yaml.default:
groups:
  - name: thanos-example
    rules:
      - alert: ExampleAlwaysFiring
        expr: vector(1)
        for: 1m
        labels:
          severity: warning
        annotations:
          summary: Example alert firing
example-alerts.yaml.title: example-alerts.yaml

rules.title: rules

cachingBucketConfig.description: Optional caching bucket config passed as a file or inline string
cachingBucketConfig.title: cachingBucketConfig
